about_the_game:
Keep the house warm as long as possible in this endless survival against the winter!
The outside temperature lowers every day!

If the inside temperature goes below 10°C the pipes will freeze!

Keep filling the heater with woodchips while also managing your hunger.
If the ashes overfill the inside temperature starts to drop.

Set the heat, order more woodchips and upgrade the house insulation from the control panel

Finding bread or fish automatically gives you money and relieves your hunger.

Ways to earn money:
Every day you get money based on the inside temperature!
Finding bread from the woodchips gives a random amount of money!
Ice fishing gives money based on fishing experience!
After day 18 you can start investing in the stock market!

Power-ups:
When you reach day 10 and 20, you get to choose 1 of 5 power-ups.
Fishing speed - Boosts your fishing speed
Pickup speed - Move woodchips and clean the ashes faster
Bread % - Boosts your chance to find bread
$2000 - instant +$2000
Daily money - Boosts the amount of money you get based on the inside temperature

Choose your power-ups wisely, manage your resources and time to survive as long as possible!

name: Keep The House Warm

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan compatible GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Your task is to keep the house warm by carrying wood chips to the heater. Brave the cold, engage in ice fishing for survival and see how long you can endure the cold challenge!
